tagline.en: We are Bepal Blockchain Security team and have been working on blockchain technology and security research in the hope of creating a world-class blockchain security ecosystem.
tagline.zh: 我们是Bepal区块链安全团队，一直致力于对区块链技术和安全领域的研究，希望能打造一个世界级的区块链安全生态。

introduce.en: Bepal team was established in 2015. The founder, Dong Ge is an angel investor who invested in F2Pool mining pool before. Bepal team has excellent R&D achievements in the areas of blockchain network infrastructure, consensus mechanism design, personal and enterprise private key protection.
introduce.zh: Bepal安全团队于2015年成立，天使投资人董戈曾投资F2Pool鱼池。Bepal安全团队在区块链网络底层构建、共识机制设计、个人及企业私钥保护等领域有着卓越的研发成果。
